page.title: 13POLITICS
page.content:
THE COMMUNITY BELONGS TO ALL PARTIES POLITICAL BUT THERE IS A VERY STRONG CONSERVATIVE BRANCH WITH 11 COMMITTEE MEMBERS WHO RUN FUND RAISING EVENTS TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE CONSERVATIVE ASSOCIATION.
IN EARLY SPRING A SHEPHERDS DELIGHT IS HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL SERVING A SHEPHERDS PIE SUPPER AND IN JULY A STRAWBERRY SPARKLE WITH MUSIC AND DANCING, STRAWBERRIES AND CREAM AND SPARKLING WINE.
{LAW AND ORDER { AS THERE IS NO LOCAL POLICMAN THIS AREA COMES UNDER THE JURISDICTION OF DEREHAM POLICE STATION.
